original_text: They also went down into hell with him unto them that be slain with the sword; and they that were his arm, that dwelt under his shadow in the midst of the heathen.
korean_text: 그러나 그들도 그와 함께 스올에 내려 칼에 죽임을 당한 자에게 이르렀나니 그들은 옛적에 그의 팔이 된 자요 나라들 가운데에서 그 그늘 아래에 거주하던 자니라

sentences.original_text: They also went down into hell with him
unto them that be slain with the sword
and they that were his arm
in the midst of the heathen
